name: Gluten-Free Rosemary Crackers
description: Try substituting sesame, sunflower, or chia seeds in place of the flax seeds…or a combo of all three!
preparation: In a medium bowl, combine the dry ingredients.
Add the oil and enough water for dough to form.
Press into a Sheet Pan, forming a thin, even layer.
Bake for 20–30 minutes, until golden brown.
When cool enough to touch, gently break into pieces. Crackers will crisp slightly as they cool and can also be re-crisped in the oven.

products.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
summary: Enjoy hearty, robust flavors on chicken, pork, lamb & grilled or roasted vegetables.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
